title: Освободители
overview: This series highlights ordinary foot-soldiers, intelligence officers, mine pickers, gunners, tank men, marines, alpine and airborne raiders and fighter and attack aviation pilots. With computer graphics, viewers witness the combat equipment design, tactics and strategy of conducting a battle. Rare newsreel shots and the reconstruction of the events allow viewers to feel the inner sense of war and see it through a soldier s eyes. From the foot soldiers to the fighter pilots, explore what life was like as a member of the Red Army from every angle.
